categories_fixed.details: Fixed recession probability calculation for flat curves
Fixed EMA calculation, VWAP/OBV implementations, ATR calculation, and stochastic oscillator
Fixed earnings momentum scoring, sector rotation signals, position sizing, risk management, news integration, acceleration bonuses, and tier classification
Fixed exit signal generation logic and multiple timeframe conflict resolution

key_fixes: Adjusted yield curve recession probability for flat curves from 0.25 to 0.35
Implemented proper EMA calculation with exponential weighting
Fixed technical indicators to return numpy arrays for vectorized operations
Corrected momentum scoring algorithms and tier thresholds
Fixed swing trading trailing stop and timeframe analysis logic
